meta.title: Web Developer
meta.description: Trilingual freelance web developer based in Europe. Specialized in React/NEXT, Vue/NUXT, MongoDB, and NodeJS.

about.title: Daniel Ladeira
about.desc1: My name is *Daniel Ladeira* and I am a *trilingual web developer* based in Poland, fluent in *English*, *Portuguese*, and *Polish*. My programming journey began in 2020, creating custom Minecraft plugins and servers, which later transitioned to web development.
about.desc2: This year I'm starting my Bachelor's in *Computer Science* at *Vrije Universiteit*, Amsterdam. While my primary focus is on *freelance web development*, I'm also growing a *productivity startup* on the side.
about.desc3: My skills span *design* and *coding*, however recently I've developed an interest in marketing and content creation.

polanner.title: Polanner
polanner.desc: A all-in-one time-tracking website for hobbyists. Integrates with a desktop application and 3rd party apps.

hoplite.title: Hoplite
hoplite.desc: A website featuring the minecraft server Hoplite. My role was to improve the existing website and Tebex configuration.

mcss.title: MCSS
mcss.desc: A minecraft server statistics SaaS application. Integrates with a plugin to display useful player statistics.
